Author: selfcontrolwya
Text: oh my god this resonated with me so much. i’m only 16 but i had the same epiphany you did, that gaining some weight is a minuscule price to pay for being happier. i’ve been in recovery for a little bit and it’s actually going ok. i’m rooting for you ☺️

Author: dominiquechat
Text: You deserve to be happy and fulfilled. I wish you the best on your way to recovery 💗
